titleStmt.title: Diotrephes catechised, or, Sixteen important questions touching the ecclesiastical jurisdiction and censures (contradistinct to civill) now eagerly pretended to and challenged by a divine right, by some over-rigid Presbyterians and Independents propounded to both these dissenting parties for the further discovery of truth, the preservation of the civil Christian magistrates interest, and speedier comprimising [sic] of our present unhappy controversies touching church-government ... / proposed, published by W. Prynne ...
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Sixteen important questions, touching, ecclesiasticall iusisdiction and censures.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
